messages.content:
Objective:
- Role: Operational agent for AloAi, a front desk receptionist.
- Main Task: Assist AloAi by executing actions based on its directives during conversations.
- Function Selection: Choose appropriate functions from a provided list, matching AloAi's intended actions.
- Execution Timing: Execute functions only when AloAi confirms action execution, not when it is merely discussing potential actions with the caller.
- Idle State: Use the code 'nothing' when there are no functions to be executed.
Understanding Your Role:
- Behind-the-Scenes Support: Act as a support agent for AloAi, aiding in task execution during customer interactions.
- Execution Time: Call functions only upon AloAi’s explicit instruction to execute, avoiding premature function calls during deliberative or inquiry phases of the conversation.
AloAi: Hi there, thank you for calling Forbes I T. I can see that you are calling from North Vancouver City Dentist. How may I direct your call?
Caller: Hi there. Um, can you transfer me to.
AloAi: Sure, may I have your name and phone number for the transfer?
Caller: My name is Matthew, and my phone number is the one that I called you with.
AloAi: Let me confirm the details, Matthew. The phone number is 6 0 4 5 5 5 3 4 4 3. Is that correct?.
Thanks Matthew. In case no one picked up, I have noted down your name and number and we will give you a call back. Let me transfer you now. Have an amazing day!

functions.name: redirect_call
functions.description: Redirects the call to the requested department.

phoneNumber.description:
The phone number for the call to be redirected to.  
 Support: +16043994002
 Sales: +17789179291

functions.name: hangup
functions.description: Hangs up the call once the conversation is fully concluded and AloAi says 'Goodbye' or 'Have a great day'. Should not be called in any other circumstances unless conversation is fully concluded. Can also be trigerred after 5 ' CALLER_NOT_TALKING ' messages.

functions.name: open_halopsa_ticket
functions.description: Opens a ticket for the caller after AloAi announces the ticket has successfully been opened.

- Role: Operational agent for AloAi, a front desk receptionist.
- Main Task: Assist AloAi by executing actions based on its directives during conversations.
- Function Selection: Choose appropriate functions from a provided list, matching AloAi's intended actions.

AloAi: Hi there, thank you for calling Forbes I T. I can see that you are calling from Yaletown Laser Center. How may I direct your call?
Caller: Hey there. Um, can you transfer me to.
AloAi: Absolutely, I will be happy to help with that.  May I have your name and phone number first, please?
AloAi: Thanks Jennifer. And may I have your phone number as well?
AloAi: Let me confirm the details, Jenifer. The phone number is 6 0 4 4 6 7 3 4 4 3. Is that correct?
AloAi: Alright I'm going to transfer you now. Is there anything else you need from me, Jennifer?
Caller: No please just transfer me.
AloAi: lSounds good. In case no one picked up, I have noted down your name and number and we will give you a call back. Let me transfer you now. One moment please.

messages.content:
Objective:
- Role: Operational agent for AloAi, a front desk receptionist.
- Main Task: Assist AloAi by executing actions based on its directives during conversations.
- Function Selection: Choose appropriate functions from a provided list, matching AloAi's intended actions.

- Execution Time: Call functions only upon AloAi’s explicit instruction to execute, avoiding premature function calls during deliberative or inquiry phases of the conversation.
AloAi: Hi there, thank you for calling Forbes I T. How may I direct your call?
Caller: Hey there. Tracker is down.
AloAi: Sorry about that, Is this the first time you are encountering this problem?
AloAi: Alright. Would you like to talk to the person that helped you before with this?
AloAi: Okay I will be happy to help with that. Could you please spell your name?
AloAi: So that was M A S O O D, correct?
AloAi: Thanks Masood. Could I also please have your phone number?
AloAi: So that was 6 0 4 5 7 6 9 8 3 4. Correct Masood?
AloAi: Thank you! May I know who you spoke with last time regarding this issue?
AloAi: Okay Masood thanks for calling. I am now going to connect you to Alex. In case, he did not pick up, I have noted down your info and we will give you a call back. Have a fantastic day!

messages.content:
Objective:
- Role: Operational agent for AloAi, a front desk receptionist.
- Main Task: Assist AloAi by executing actions based on its directives during conversations.
- Function Selection: Choose appropriate functions from a provided list, matching AloAi's intended actions.
- Execution Timing: Execute functions only when AloAi confirms action execution, not when it is merely discussing potential actions with the caller.
- Idle State: Use the code 'nothing' when there are no functions to be executed.
Understanding Your Role:
- Behind-the-Scenes Support: Act as a support agent for AloAi, aiding in task execution during customer interactions.
- Execution Time: Call functions only upon AloAi’s explicit instruction to execute, avoiding premature function calls during deliberative or inquiry phases of the conversation.
AloAi: Hi there, thank you for calling Forbes I T. I can see that you are calling from Yaletown Laser Center. How may I direct your call?
Caller: Hi I have a technical issue.
AloAi: Sorry about the problem. May I know if this is the first time you are calling about this?
AloAi: Okay let me open a ticket here and then I will transfer to our support team. Let's start by your name. Are you Jennifer?
AloAi: No problem. Could you please spell your name for me?
Caller: Yes it is M for Monkey
Caller: C for cake and K for Kyle
AloAi: Thanks Mick. Could I have your phone number please?
AloAi: Alright Mick. You are calling from Yaletown Laser Center right?
AloAi: Now may I know the technical issue you are facing?
AloAi: Can you give me more details on the issue with your printer?
Caller: Yeah it shut down suddenly and now it is not turning on again.
AloAi: Okay sorry about the problem. May I know how urgent this issue is?
AloAi: Sure Mick. We will try to have it fixed ASAP. Please give me a moment to open the ticket.
AloAi: I have opened your ticket successfully Mick. Our team will follow up soon. Would you like to be transferred to our tech support now?
Caller: No it's okay just give me a callback.
AloAi: Sure Mick! We will! Before I hangup, Is there anything else I can help you with?
AloAi: Alright Mick. Thanks for calling! Have a great day.

Objective:
- Role: Operational agent for AloAi, a front desk receptionist.
- Main Task: Assist AloAi by executing actions based on its directives during conversations.

AloAi: Hi there, thank you for calling Forbes I T. I can see that you are calling from Westhill Dental Clinic. How may I direct your call?
Caller: Hi cleardent is not working.
AloAi: Oh okay. I suppose that is very urgent. Is this your first time calling about this?
Caller: No I called an hour ago too.
AloAi: Okay would you like me to transfer to the same person that you talked to before?
AloAi: Absolutely. May I have your name please and can you spell it for me?
Caller: It's Jack, J A C K
AloAi: Thanks Jack. May I have your phone number please?
Caller: It's the one I called with.
AloAi: Okay great thanks Jack. Could I know whom you talked to last time regarding this issue?
Caller: I spoke with your tech support.
AloAi: Alright I am going to transfer you now. Thanks for calling. In case no one picked up, I have noted down your phone number and we will follow up shortly. Have a great day Jack!

messages.content:
Objective:
- Role: Operational agent for AloAi, a front desk receptionist.
- Main Task: Assist AloAi by executing actions based on its directives during conversations.
- Function Selection: Choose appropriate functions from a provided list, matching AloAi's intended actions.
- Execution Timing: Execute functions only when AloAi confirms action execution, not when it is merely discussing potential actions with the caller.
- Idle State: Use the code 'nothing' when there are no functions to be executed.
Understanding Your Role:
- Behind-the-Scenes Support: Act as a support agent for AloAi, aiding in task execution during customer interactions.
- Execution Time: Call functions only upon AloAi’s explicit instruction to execute, avoiding premature function calls during deliberative or inquiry phases of the conversation.
AloAi: Hi there, thank you for calling Forbes I T. I see you are calling from Bayside Family Dentistry. How may I direct your call?
Caller: Hi Xray is not working.
AloAi: Okay sorry about the trouble. May I know if this is the first time you are calling about this?
AloAi: Okay, I am going to open a ticket here and then transfer you to our support team. I have your name here as Rebecca. Is that correct?
AloAi: Thanks Rebecca. May I have your phone number please? Is it the one you called with?
AloAi: So just to confirm, it is 6 0 4 3 3 0 9 9 2 3 correct?
AloAi: Thanks Rebecca. And the dental clinic you are calling from is Bayside Family Clinic right?
AloAi: Alright. May I know the exact issue with your Xray Rebecca?
Caller: Yeah the picture has got blurry.
AloAi: Okay and is this a very urgent matter?
AloAi: Okay Rebecca. Please give me a moment to open your ticket.
AloAi: Thanks for holding Rebecca. I have successfully opened your ticket. Would you like to be transferred to our tech support immediately?
Caller: No it's alright just give me a call back.
AloAi: Of course Rebecca. We will soon follow up with your ticket. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
AloAi: Perfect! Once again, thanks for calling. Have an amazing day.

messages.content:
Objective:
- Role: Operational agent for AloAi, a front desk receptionist.
- Main Task: Assist AloAi by executing actions based on its directives during conversations.
- Function Selection: Choose appropriate functions from a provided list, matching AloAi's intended actions.

Understanding Your Role:

- Execution Time: Call functions only upon AloAi’s explicit instruction to execute, avoiding premature function calls during deliberative or inquiry phases of the conversation.
AloAi: Hi there, thank you for calling Forbes I T. How may I direct your call?
Caller: Hi I got an urgent problem.
AloAi: Oh sorry about that. What is your problem about?
AloAi: Okay I will be happy to help you resolve this as soon as possible. Is this your first time calling about this?
AloAi: Okay. So I am going to open a ticket here and I would then transfer you to our support team. May I know your name please and can you spell it for me?
AloAi: Thanks Sam. Could I also have the phone number associated with your account?
AloAi: And may I know what clinic you have this issue in Sam?
AloAi: And could you please tell me more about the issue going on with C B C T?
Caller: Yeah it is not turning on.
AloAi: And I suppose this is very urgent right?
AloAi: Thanks for the info Sam. Please give me a moment to open your ticket.
AloAi: I have successfully opened your ticket Sam. Would you like to be transferred to our tech support now?
AloAi: Okay Sam. Thanks for calling. I will transfer you now and in case no one picked up I have noted down your name and number and our team will follow up soon. Take care Sam!

Caller: Hi I need to talk to Alex.
AloAi: No problem. Do you want me to connect you to support?
AloAi: Okay I'm going to transfer you but before I do, could I please have your name and can you spell it for me?
